snippet: The policy appears to be an attempt by officials to combat a surge in ethnic violence by putting in place systemic restrictions over who is allowed to leave and enter China.
abstract: Chinese police order Xinjiang residents to turn in passports in attempt to combat surge in violence between ethnic Uighurs and ruling ethnic Han.
lead_paragraph: The policy appears to be an attempt by officials to combat a surge in ethnic violence by putting in place systemic restrictions over who is allowed to leave and enter China.

headline.main: Chinese Police Order Residents in a Xinjiang Prefecture to Turn In Passports
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: New Restrictions in Border Area
